mapper.sql: submit_id, homework_id, course_id, class_id, student_id, user_id, student_name, submit_content, submit_time, submit_status, score, teacher_comment, grade_time, grader_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO edu_homework_submit (homework_id, course_id, class_id, student_id, user_id, student_name, submit_content, submit_time, submit_status) VALUES (#{homeworkId}, #{courseId}, #{classId}, #{studentId}, #{userId}, #{studentName}, #{submitContent}, NOW(), #{submitStatus})
mapper.update: UPDATE edu_homework_submit SET score = #{score}, teacher_comment = #{teacherComment}, grade_time = NOW(), grader_id = #{graderId}, submit_status = '2' WHERE submit_id = #{submitId}
mapper.select: SELECT s.submit_id AS submitId, s.homework_id AS homeworkId, s.course_id AS courseId, s.user_id AS userId, u.nick_name AS studentName, s.submit_content AS submitContent, s.submit_time AS submitTime, s.submit_status AS submitStatus, s.score AS score, s.teacher_comment AS teacherComment, s.grade_time AS gradeTime FROM edu_homework_submit s LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE s.homework_id = #{homeworkId} ORDER BY s.submit_time DESC
